summary: Legs. And you can hit (or kick?) people with them.
descriptionHtml:
Adds two severed legs that are conditioned into weapons to the game. Each is a unique left and right leg. Even if you aren\'t much of a melee fighter in Skyrim, they really do look great mounted on the weapon racks in your home. You can find one in \'Broken Fang Cave\' which is somewhat west of Whiterun and you can find the second one inside \'Reachcliff Cave\' which is somewhat southeast of Markarth.

If you\'re too lazy to go get them, one is named \'Femur Fatale\' and the other \'I am Leg-End\'. By typing in the console \"help femur\" and \"help Leg-End\" it will show the item codes for each. Then you can simply type \"player.additem <code> 1\" for both of them.

I encourage you to submit new screenshots of your character using them. Feedback (good or bad) and endorsements is/are also appreciated.

Thanks and enjoy.

To install, simply merge the provided data folder with the data folder in your skyrim directory.

To unistall, simply delete \"leggar.esp\" in your data folder and delete the folders titled leggar in your texture and meshes folders.
author: Joe Camel

files.name: A Leg Up
files.changelogHtml: Converted to one-handed weapon, and added a unique right leg version.
